functions.author: The Coven of Tomes
pages:
§c[Warming Aura]§1

The rising of the Sun brings about hope and happiness for even the most prepared of Witches. It is these positive thoughts that fuel the power of §cWarming Aura§1. Within an area,§r
§1the Witch releases a wave of healing warmth that accelerates the healing of the mobs around them. It is quite a useful spell for healers and adventurers alike.
